author: Edmund Burke
message: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Schweitzer
message: Constant kindness can accomplish much. As the sun makes ice melt, kindness causes misunderstanding, mistrust, and hostility to evaporate.
title: Thought of the day

author: Rene Descartes
message: The greatest minds are capable of the greatest vices as well as of the greatest virtues.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Einstein
message: A man should look for what is, and not for what he thinks should be.
title: Thought of the day
